location.city: Shenzhen, Guangdong, People Republic of China

work.overview: Craft both Desktop and Mobile webpages' user interface and interaction, including prototype and demo craft.

In charge of the community website development to Oupeng X (a lab version to Opera Mobile Browser in China) and Sphinx Game Engine (the first HTML5 Game Engine from Opera), developed with multiple programming skills like JavaScript / CSS / PHP, bug fixes for several games running on Sphinx game engine.
Founded conference at first, then crafted the circle scope of ADCmnt (short for Adolescent Developer Commnunity)
work.highlights: Curator of the 1st Conference (2012.adc-cn.org) and Co-curator of 2nd Conference (2013.adc-cn.org), in charge of all design productions, community cooperated with few notable company and technology group in China like Tencent / Baidu and OSChina.

work.overview: Mainly worked on translating ICT and physics news.

highlights.name: Contributed to a biology topic named An Overview of Encode Project in Chinese

education.location: Shenzhen, Guangdong, People Republic of China
